mapper.select: SELECT FB.*, COUNT(R.board_idx) AS count, MAX(FB.closed_chk) AS closed_chk FROM freeboard FB LEFT JOIN report R ON FB.board_idx = R.board_idx GROUP BY FB.board_idx, FB.board_category, FB.mem_id, FB.board_title, FB.board_contents, FB.board_file, FB.board_visitcount, FB.board_postdate, FB.closed_chk

SELECT FB.*, COUNT(R.board_idx) AS count, MAX(FB.closed_chk) AS closed_chk FROM freeboard FB LEFT JOIN report R ON FB.board_idx = R.board_idx WHERE FB.board_idx = #{board_idx} GROUP BY FB.board_idx, FB.board_category, FB.mem_id, FB.board_title, FB.board_contents, FB.board_file, FB.board_visitcount, FB.board_postdate, FB.closed_chk
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard (board_idx, board_category, mem_id, board_title, board_contents, board_file) values (bodycoding_seq.nextval, '공지', #{mem_id}, #{board_title}, #{board_contents}, #{board_file})
